entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023
